column4: Im having trouble installing ubuntu, i reach the installation menu when booting with the cd, but when chooising Start/Install ubuntu my screen turns black after "loading linux kernel" window pops up, same thing happends with safe-graphic, and ive tried switching resolution in the install menu
Whats the alternate cd and where do i find that?
http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download, check the box that indicates you want the alternate CD
